com.pgmacdesign.pgmactips.utilities

Class CameraMediaUtilities

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pgmacdesign.pgmactips.utilities.CameraMediaUtilities

  • public class CameraMediaUtilities
extends java.lang.Object
    Note! If you are using the cropping option, you must include the UCrop dependency and activity in your project, https://github.com/Yalantis/uCrop. Created by pmacdowell on 8/16/2016.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  CameraMediaUtilities.CameraUtilityOptionsAndFlags
      Flags and options class for specific things to happen within the Camera Utilities calls

      Class for handling Photo Objects

      Source Type enum to be used for photo setting / getting
      static class  CameraMediaUtilities.SupportedPhotoFileExtensions
      Supported Photo File extensions.

      • doesCodeBelongToUtility

        public static boolean doesCodeBelongToUtility(int requestCode)
        This checks against the request code in the activityResult to the ones in this class. If it matches one here, it returns true, else, returns false
        Parameters:
        requestCode - request code to compare against from the onActivityResult method
        Returns:
        Boolean, true if it should be send back to this class' afterOnActivityResult method

      • showAlertOrNot

        public void showAlertOrNot(boolean bool)
        Shows or hides the alert dialog depending on the boolean passed
        Parameters:
        bool - true for show, false for hide

      • startPhotoProcess

        public void startPhotoProcess(CameraMediaUtilities.SourceType typeOfPicture)
                       throws android.os.FileUriExposedException
        Starts the photo process depending on what is passed in
        Parameters:
        typeOfPicture - Type of action to be taken depending on the SourceType
        Throws:
        android.os.FileUriExposedException - If you are targeting Build.VERSION_CODES#N or higher, fileProviderStr is required. For more info on this, please see this link: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/38200282/android-os-fileuriexposedexception-file-storage-emulated-0-test-txt-exposed

      • getCameraPermissions

        public boolean getCameraPermissions()
        VisionRequests Camera Permissions
        Returns:
        boolean, true if granted, false if not

      • getStoragePermissions

        public boolean getStoragePermissions()
        VisionRequests Write Storage Permissions
        Returns:
        boolean, true if granted, false if not

      • buildUCropOptions

        public static com.yalantis.ucrop.UCrop.Options buildUCropOptions(int frameColor,
                                                                 int statusBarColor,
                                                                 int toolbarColor)
        Build uCrop Options. This assumes you have already parsed the color using correct syntax, IE, ContextCompat.getColor(context, R.color.BLUE)
        Parameters:
        frameColor - int color for the frame. Pass -100 to default them to regular colors
        statusBarColor - int color for the status bar. Pass -100 to default them to regular colors
        toolbarColor - int color for the toolbar. Pass -100 to default them to regular colors
        Returns:
        Return UCrop.Options object

      • buildUCropOptions

        public static com.yalantis.ucrop.UCrop.Options buildUCropOptions(@NonNull
                                                                 android.content.Context context,
                                                                 int frameColor,
                                                                 int statusBarColor,
                                                                 int toolbarColor)

      • buildUCropOptions

        public static com.yalantis.ucrop.UCrop.Options buildUCropOptions(java.lang.String frameColor,
                                                                 java.lang.String statusBarColor,
                                                                 java.lang.String toolbarColor)
        Build uCrop Options
        Parameters:
        frameColor - String color for the frame. Pass -100 or null to default them to regular colors
        statusBarColor - String color for the status bar. Pass -100 or null to default them to regular colors
        toolbarColor - String color for the toolbar. Pass -100 or null to default them to regular colors
        Returns:
        Return UCrop.Options object

      • doesUserHaveFrontFacingCamera

        public static int doesUserHaveFrontFacingCamera(android.content.Context context)
        Checks if user has front facing camera.
        Parameters:
        context - Context used to check
        Returns:
        0 For front facing, 1 for back facing, -1 for if it does not have front facing at all
